title: How to Use a PS5 Controller on Xbox One

steps.title: Yes, you can do so using an adapter or with Xbox Game Pass on a different device.
steps.content: Yes, you can do so using an adapter or with Xbox Game Pass on a different device. The PS5 controller will not work with an Xbox One by itself. In order to get a PS5 controller to work with an Xbox One, you need to purchase a third-party adapter. [1] X Research source Alternatively, you can connect your PS5 controller to a PC or mobile device and play Xbox games using Xbox Game Pass.

steps.title: You can do so pretty easily.
steps.content: You can do so pretty easily. First, you need to connect to the adapter to a USB port on your Xbox One console. The adapter should have a USB port that you can use to connect the PS5 controller. Simply connect the PS5 controller to the adapter using a USB Type-C-to-Type-A cable. Certain DualSense features, including the motion sensors, touchpad, haptic feedback, and vibration may not work on the Xbox One and other devices.

steps.title: There are a variety of adapters you can choose from.
steps.content: There are a variety of adapters you can choose from. It is recommended you do a little research on a product before purchasing it. Check the compatibility carefully and make sure that it is compatible with both a PS5 controller and an Xbox One gaming console. A lot of controller adapters are compatible with PS5 controllers and other game consoles, but not Xbox game consoles. Prices can range from $40 to $99, which may be more than the price of a new Xbox One controller. Many of these adapters are also compatible with other game consoles, like Nintendo Switch. The following are a few adapters and converters that can be used to connect a PS5 controller to an Xbox One: Brook Wingman XB Titan Two Cronus Zen

steps.title: The PS5 controller can connect to a PC, as well as smartphones.
steps.content: The PS5 controller can connect to a PC, as well as smartphones. You can play Xbox games on your smartphone using the Game Pass app. You can play Xbox games on your PC using the Xbox Windows app. You can also play Xbox games using Microsoft Edge, Google Chrome, or Safari web browsers at https://www.xbox.com/play . A subscription to Xbox Game Pass is required. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You can connect your PS5 Controller to other devices using a USB cable or Bluetooth.
steps.content: You can connect your PS5 Controller to other devices using a USB cable or Bluetooth. You can easily connect your PS5 controller to a PC or Mac using a USB cable. You can also connect your PS5 controller to your PC, Mac, or smartphone using Bluetooth. [3] X Research source USB Connection: To connect your PS5 to a PC or Mac, simply use a USB Type-C to A cable to connect your PS5 controller to a free USB port on your PC. You can also use a USB Type-C to C cable if you have a compatible USB port on your PC. Press the PS button and you are ready to go. Bluetooth: To put your PS5 controller in bluetooth pairing mode, press and hold the PS button and the Sharing button to the left of the touchpad until the light around the touchpad starts flashing. Open the Bluetooth settings on your device and select your PS5 controller. If you are asked to enter pairing code, enter "0000." You can pair your PS5 controller on Windows , Mac, Android, as well as iPhone and iPad . [4] X Research source

steps.title: You can use an old Xbox One controller or a third-party controller.
steps.content: You can use an old Xbox One controller or a third-party controller. Using an adapter to connect your PS5 controller to an Xbox One may be more expensive than it's worth. Luckily, with the release of Xbox Series S/X, the price of Xbox One controllers are dropping. You may be able to get an off-brand third-party controller even cheaper.
